mapper.select: SELECT L.oid, L.mid, L.ozipcode, L.oaddress1, L.oaddress2, L.odate, L.oreceiver, L.otel, L.ousedmileage, L.ousedcoupon, L.opayment, L.ostatus, L.oaccountdeadline, L.odiscounted, COUNT(*) as countitem FROM ORDERLIST L, ORDERITEM I WHERE L.oid = I.oid GROUP BY L.oid, L.mid, L.ozipcode, L.oaddress1, L.oaddress2, L.odate, L.oreceiver, L.otel, L.ousedmileage, L.ousedcoupon, L.opayment, L.ostatus, L.oaccountdeadline, L.odiscounted
SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal FROM ORDERLIST WHERE OID=#{oid}
